text.tspan: Share of primary energy by source over the long-term, measured as the percentage of total energy consumption.
Primary electricity includes: hydropower, nuclear power, wind, photoÂ­voltaics, tidal, wave and solar thermal and
geothermal (only figures for electricity production are included).
Data source: Joint Center for History and Economics, Harvard University and University of Cambridge
